contents.text:
Editing your account 

Here, you can edit your account information.

User avatar

Using 'Avatar' section you can upload your image and save it as your account image. When you are 'logged in', your image comes in different sections such as the top toolbar.

Click on 'Edit' button and choose your image.

When you choose your image, click on the 'SAVE' button to save your image. The 'SAVE' button appears when you click on 'EDIT' button.

General setting

In the profile section, you can edit your name, last name, your language and time zone. When you fill out the fields click on the 'UPDATE' button to save the information. 

1. Account information

This section is your 'id', 'username' and 'email' and is non-editable. These are just in reading mode.

1. Password settings

Here, you can reset your password. Enter your old password into the first field and your new one into the second and third fields. Then click on the 'CHANGE PASSWORD' to reset your password.
